column4: Hey guys, my bro is new to ubuntu and is trying to browse the samba server set up on my computer (he's on the same network as me)
and then
have you shared anything from your server like some folder?
at the "connect to Server" what are the inputs
what do you mean?
easy way to connect to remote server is by Places>>"connect to Server"
where is that?
Places
just beside the applications and system
isn't network://// easier?
well if gui is convenient for him then why not
I don't see why its not working for him...
thats what were trying to look...
did you do what i have suggested?
nothing. There are no replys
let him use the "connect to Server" and supply inputs there
What do I put under Server and share
windows share
skip the "share:"
I know its a windows share, I want to know what I put under server and share
server is your servers network ip
username is your servers username login and then connect you are prompted to supply the passwd and use the server login password
Folder: is the shared folder of your server
recheck your shared folder if it was correctly configured for sharing..
